Title: Mare matto
Writer: Leonardo Benvenuti, Renato Castellani, Piero De Bernardi
Actors: Gina Lollobrigida, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Tomas Milian, Odoardo Spadaro
Plot: A pretty woman approaching middle age rents out rooms in a small Italian town. An aging sailor and a handsome younger man are amongst the lodgers.
